title: Achieving superior oxygen evolution of perovskite via phase transition and electrochemical reconstruction strategy
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, 17,4044-4054
DOI: 10.1039/D3EE04338J, Paper
Yi-ru Hao, Hui Xue, Jing Sun, Niankun Guo, Tianshan Song, Hongliang Dong, Zhonglong Zhao, Jiangwei Zhang, Limin Wu, Qin Wang
We propose a strategy of phase transformation and electrochemical reconstruction to improve the OER performance of perovskite oxides. The RuSA-Co3O4/CoOOH catalyst exhibits an ultra-low overpotential of 175 mV at 10 mA cmâˆ’2, superior to previously reported perovskite-derived OER electrocatalysts.
